name: The Year of Rat
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the Year of Rat, one of the animal-symbols of the Oriental calendar, which is based on the twelve months cycle of Jupiter, the largest planet of the Solar system.
averseDescription: On the coin obverse within setting made of a conventionalized vegetable ornamentation there are inscriptions:НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК/ УКРАЇНИ/ 5/ ГРИВЕНЬ (National Bank /of Ukraine/ 5/ Hryvnia); above there is the small National Emblem of Ukraine, beneath: 2008, the coin issue year, as well as Ag 925, the designation of metal; 15,55g, its weight in fineness and the NBU Mint logotype.
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is depicted a rat made in a technique of a cheap popular print within a vegetable ornamentation setting (a rat eye is decorated with 0,01carat diamond). Both above and below this composition there is a depiction of contour figures of all 12 symbols of the Oriental calendar.
